transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
+3% Ally Team Effectiveness
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
+3% Ally Team Effectiveness
+25 Action Points at battle start

SKT_FIRST.name: Be My Friend!
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy, and has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Marked</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\nAfter attacking, when the target is inflicted with a debuff, deals <color=#28d9ed>2%</color> of the target's Max Health as fixed damage.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Increases damage\nIncreases chance to inflict Marked by 25%

SKT_BURST_2.effect: Adds 2% of the target's Max Health as fixed damage

description: Attacks an enemy, and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000079_1_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Marked</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000079_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\nAfter attacking, when the target is inflicted with a debuff, deals <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000079_1_2]</color> of the target's Max Health as fixed damage.

SKT_SECOND.name: It's Not Bedtime Yet!
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Passive Effect) When attacking a target inflicted with a debuff, increases damage of all allies by <color=#28d9ed>2%</color> (Max 5 stacks).\n\n(Triggered Effect) Upon death, immediately <color=#28d9ed>resurrects</color> with <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> Health. Has a <color=#28d9ed>75%</color> chance to reduce Priority of all enemies by <color=#28d9ed>100%</color>. Right after using this skill, does not trigger an enemy's Counterattack, Revenge, or Agile Response.
description: (Passive Effect) When attacking a target inflicted with a debuff, increases damage of all allies by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000079_2_1]</color> (Max 5 stacks).\n\n(Triggered Effect) Upon death, immediately <color=#28d9ed>resurrects</color> with <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000079_2_2]</color> Health. Has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000079_2_3]</color> chance to reduce Priority of all enemies by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000079_2_3]</color>. Right after using this skill, does not trigger an enemy's Counterattack, Revenge, or Agile Response.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Soulslayer Role-Play!
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies. Has a <color=#28d9ed>75%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>buff reversal</color> on the target, and ignores Immunity to increase debuff durations by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>. After attacking, when the target is not inflicted with dispellable <color=#28d9ed>reduced stat effects</color>, deals <color=#28d9ed>2%</color> of the target's Max Health as fixed damage.
description: Attacks all enemies. Has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000079_3_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>buff reversal</color> on the target, and ignores Immunity to increase debuff durations by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000079_3_2] turn(s)</color>. After attacking, when the target is not inflicted with dispellable <color=#28d9ed>reduced stat effects</color>, deals <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000079_3_3]</color> of the target's Max Health as fixed damage.

3: +3% target's Max Health as fixed damage
5: +3% target's Max Health as fixed damage

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, recovers <color=#28d9ed>25</color> Chain Points.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>75%</color> chance to inflict Marked for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, recovers <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000079_chain_1_1]</color> Chain Points.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000079_backup_1_1]</color> chance to inflict Marked for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000079_backup_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
